guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: Without bothering to watch: anyone who claims the antichrist is being set up before he sets himself up, especially before the rapture, has missed the plot.

body: To give a brief summary, OP is warning against the very real threat of the "Progressive Chrurch". Unfortunately, he seems to have trumped it up a bit by saying the truth in a way that sounds incorrect (by unintentionally implying that denominational differences themselves are a sign of false prophecy, and jumping the gun by using the term antichrist prematurely).
body_html: To give a brief summary, OP is warning against the very real threat of the "Progressive Chrurch". Unfortunately, he seems to have trumped it up a bit by saying the truth in a way that sounds incorrect (by unintentionally implying that denominational differences themselves are a sign of false prophecy, and jumping the gun by using the term antichrist prematurely).

body: I actually feel like the fundamentalist churches are a bigger threat because they actually have some influence. The progressive ones are mostly just vanity and emptiness, and might as well not exist. Progressives seize their power over the media and big government/business instead.
body_html: I actually feel like the fundamentalist churches are a bigger threat because they actually have some influence. The progressive ones are mostly just vanity and emptiness, and might as well not exist. Progressives seize their power over the media and big government/business instead.

body: We're spoiled. 95% of history was *much* more gruesome and distressful than now. Constant wars, invasions for no reason, torture, no religious freedom. Everything was based on power and control and idol worship. Sorry, but there's no way you can honestly claim *now* is the worst time ever.
body_html: We're spoiled. 95% of history was much more gruesome and distressful than now. Constant wars, invasions for no reason, torture, no religious freedom. Everything was based on power and control and idol worship. Sorry, but there's no way you can honestly claim now is the worst time ever.

body:
> But of that day and hour no one knoweth, not the angels of heaven, but the Father alone. Matthew 24:36

no one knows when the end actually is but God, we just can see signs that suggest the season may be here but no one actually knows for sure probably until it starts happening

guild.description_html:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God.

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
guild.name: Christianity

parent.body:
You are right but it also says...
King James Bible
Luke 21:25
And there shall be signs in the sun, and in the moon, and in the stars; and upon the earth distress of nations, with perplexity; the sea and the waves roaring

body:
> Everything is unfolding just as the bible foretold. Wars, Volcanic Eruptions, Earthquakes, Extreme Weather, Christian Persecution, Violence and more!

I know right, none of this has ever happened before at any point in history until now!
